name: Hollow point 9, Sins Of Yesterday CD
blurb:
hey friends. We are Hollow Point 9.
We are calling on you to help us.
In our journey to make our debut album.

name: The Seraphim Rising
blurb: The Seraphim Rising's debut EP, Life In Suspension is a meaningful, musical exploration into the heart of human mythos.

name: Pussy Factory: Kickstart Our Album
blurb: It's here! It's here! It's finally here! Our first, full length album is mixed, mastered and ready to go, BUT... we ran out of money!!!

name: New Kelli Schaefer Album - "The Cone"
blurb: Your contribution will make the release of this album possible. Thank you for helping me bring this story to life.

name: FEEL BETTER: Derek Fawcett's solo, full-length debut
blurb: Fawcett's FEEL BETTER is an album of love unrequited, realized, and rued, with echoes of Petty, Springsteen, Neil Young & Coldplay.

name: ADRIANNA MATEO • The Album
blurb: Let's make some noise ;)

name: Tony Mecca quests to release his "Heavy Mental Gypsies"
blurb: Tony Mecca is close to releasing his new double-length CD to the wonderfully loyal lovers of his Rock 'n Roll Psychotherapy.

name: Lou Topet & H.Cano "Abesti bat gutxiago"
blurb: Lou Topet eta Harkaitz Canok abeslari estatu batuarren 10 abesti euskarara ekarri ditugu. Zure laguntza behar dugu amaitzeko. Bultza!!!

name: Catherine Elms - So Far From Whole EP
blurb: Help me fund my 2nd studio EP! Dark cabaret piano-driven songs with a heavy grunge feel.

name: Craig's Debut Album
blurb: GOAL PASSED - we can press CDs without debt!  If we hit $4K we can do vinyl without debt too!  See update #2 for stretch goals/rewards!

name: THIS IS US - A New Album supporting the CCFA
blurb: This is us: a brass-rock band from Maryland, and our #PancakeNation. Watch the full story on our Youtube and help us support the CCFA!

name: The Space In Between :: bubbleGUN's 14-track masterpiece
blurb:
Be a part of the making of this hard hitting, dreamy, rhythmic, hot-as-magma bubbleGUN album: 
The Space In Between!

name: The New Schematics Debut EP!
blurb: Everyone has a story. We want you to be a part of ours. From The Ship, to The Farm, to your ears, let's release this EP together!

name: LANE CHANGE is making an ALBUM!
blurb: Come join the ride and help us introduce our ROCK and SOUL sound with our debut release!

name: Rumble - Original Roots Rock / Rockabilly Album!
blurb: Goal: to create a red-hot original album. Back to basics, simple, solid and pure.

name: Help Left Wing Fascists Record their Third CD
blurb: Help the band make it back to the studio.  Pre-order the CD 1 CD with personalize thank you autographed for each 25 dollar pledge.

name: Face - European Tour 2015
blurb: Face is going on our first-ever European Tour! Help us fund the tour and introduce our music to an international audience!

name: Electric Ladyland [Redux]
blurb: Earthless, The Budos Band, All Them Witches, Open Hand, Elder, Wo Fat & others to release "Electric Ladyland" on Jimi's Birthday.

name: Shiprock & Anchordog Literally Include Everyone
blurb: For the second episode in our series of rock opera CDs, we want to give all of you a speaking role...

name: Kevin Johnston's band's debut album
blurb: Our band is recording our debut album! YOU are invited to physically be a part of it! Together, we are going to rock so hard.

name: Lightning 20 Artist Series and Quarterly
blurb: We believe in the transcendent power of rock n roll.

name: Radio Black Debut Album @ Studio 606
blurb: TJ had the opportunity to record 3 songs at the Foo Fighters' private studio - 606. Help us finish an album with the whole band!

name: Release The Next Five Times August Album!
blurb: Five Times August needs your support releasing the next album! Pre-Order your copy and get cool prizes, the more you give the more you get!

name: Aloud presents their 4th record: It's Got To Be Now
blurb: Aloud decides to make a record that screams: this is what a rock n' roll band sounds like making music LIVE.

name: Catscan! New Album Project
blurb: Washington DC's electronic rock duo, Catscan!, is so ready to head back into the studio, armed with a stack of newly written songs!

name: It's Christmas, Everybody! Vinyl record by the Silver Bells
blurb: We've recorded 8 original Christmas songs and want to release them on a real vinyl record!

name: High Orbit Saves The Pandas
blurb: A musical outer-space adventure from Matthew Ebel featuring piano rock, robots, pandas, time travel, lens flares, and plot holes.

name: The Archaic Revival Debut Album ROCK 'N' ROLL HOLOCAUST
blurb: The Archaic Revival have recorded a kickass LP but we're out of cash. Back this project to summon the almighty Rock 'n' Roll Holocaust!

name: Amy Fairchild is making a new record. Join in the fun!
blurb: Multi-award winning songwriter, Amy Fairchild, is recording her 3rd record–some of her best writing yet! She needs your help to finish…

name: Noah's Ark: 10 (or the Rocket Radio) - Album Mastering
blurb: Noah has been working hard in his home studio to complete his second album but needs your help to master the record.

name: KrashZen Debut Album
blurb: KrashZen is just about finished with their debut album!  They need your help to make it a reality!

name: Afghan Band Kabul Dreams Recording New Album in California
blurb: Afghan Rock Band Kabul Dreams moved to U.S from Afghanistan to record their NEW ALBUM. Please support them to make this happen!

name: Pre-order DANCEHALL's first record!!!
blurb: Help fund the pressing of DANCEHALL's first record by pre-ordering it in advance!!!

name: Pre-order Spoilers debut album 'Anti Vibe' on 12" LP
blurb: Spoilers are releasing their first album, help us out by pre-ordering it here with exclusive extras.

name: Prison B*tch: Tour and CD Release!
blurb: 3 rowdy ladies and their accomplice guard seek financing to put out their first EP and take the party across the great Southwest.

name: Vinyl-Preorder: ALPHA NORD - Live at PsyKA Festival Vol. 3
blurb: Preorder the new ALPHA NORD vinyl (1x 12"/30cm, 140g), recorded live at the 3rd PsyKA Festival on Oct 2nd in Karlsruhe/Germany.

name: Invisible Light (a new album from James Egan)
blurb: I am in the middle of recording a new album and hoping to fund the final parts of it.

name: Pledge Per Song-a-thon!
blurb:
Challenged myself to record raw 101 Songs in 101 Days, 
from music made since my 20's. Collecting pledges towards
recording for real!

name: Creating hope & inspiration with Manafest's new album Stones
blurb: I'm continuing my journey of sharing hope and inspiration with my 10th studio album. 1st goal reached, please help me reach the 2nd!

name: Alex, Dan, Nick & Adam (Flip Rushmore) need your support.
blurb: Four guys formed a Minneapolis rock band and recorded a full-length album. They need your help to deliver it to the masses.

name: Good To Be Me: Americana record by Sheila Marshall
blurb: It’s been 5 years since my last album release and I have a collection of songs that I’m so excited to share with YOU!

name: Brookhurst: Full-Length Album "Heartstrings"
blurb: Help us fund our second full-length "Heartstrings" - to be released in late March 2019.

name: More Than Skies, “Everyone is a Loaded Gun” Vinyl.
blurb: More Than Skies has a new album coming out and we will be releasing our third LP, “Everyone is a Loaded Gun”, on vinyl!

name: Fossils Of The Mind: Will Lawton & Weasel Howlett (Vinyl LP)
blurb: Two independent British musicians looking to release their new album as a beautiful double vinyl package.

name: Adult Cinema - the 1st and 2nd Albums on Vinyl LP
blurb: I’ve made two albums in my career so far and people keep asking for them on vinyl - so help me make that happen!

name: Arcadia - Audio and Visual Album by Crown Colony
blurb: Our first full-length record is far from just a concept album. We've collaborated with tons of local artists across many disciplines.

name: Leona X - "The Woman In Me" - New CD
blurb: Known as the “Super Girl from the USA”! Leona X is set to record a new CD! The new songs are raw, sexy and guitar heavy rock n roll!

name: Treadmill Trackstar's 25th Anniversary: Last Show & EP
blurb: Please join us in celebrating 25 years of quietly making loud music with one last show and one last recording.

name: Strange Creatures
blurb: The third studio album from independent brass-rock artist Stacked Like Pancakes, produced by Matt Squire. Pre-order the album now!

name: Kolm - Debut Album "Umbra"
blurb: Kolm's debut album titled 'Umbra' explores different stages of the shadow.

name: MxPx: Full Length Album #10
blurb: We are going to record and release our new album, by crowdfunding every aspect of the record

name: Punk Cover Moose Oldies Volume 1
blurb: Pop-Punk style cover album of oldies songs on 12-inch vinyl, CD and digital distribution.

name: Help Lauren Murphy & The Psychedelics make their 1st Record
blurb:
Buy the Ticket & Take the ride with The Psychedelics; Southern Psychedelia with San Francisco Vibes. 
Jazz-Rock-Electric

name: Breaking Out - The new rock album from Verity White
blurb: I am so excited to share with you my first full-length rock album!

name: The Hempsteadys Surge Forward: Preorder their new album now
blurb: The "P-Funk of Street Punk" is back with an incredible new album on vinyl called Séance! Séance! Despite the odds.

name: The Great Again LP Vinyl :: by PANCHO MORRIS
blurb: YOUR RESISTANCE ALBUM. YOUR PERSISTENCE ALBUM. THE GREATEST ALBUM. THE ALBUM OF OUR TIMES. Available digitally and on vinyl.

name: Crackle & Pop! / Studio Expansion + Long Live Egg!
blurb: Help us expand the studio to house legendary gear used by Mudhoney, Young Fresh Fellows,  Presidents of the USA and many others.

name: Showbiz Album - Muse
blurb: An album of Showbiz original tunes.

name: Jake VanDerGinst Debut Album
blurb: I'm making my debut album. All songs are written myself, I'm playing all the instruments, recording, producing, mixing & mastering.

name: Setting Gold, Rising Silver (EP)
blurb: A new four track, face-melting, rock'n'roll EP with all original music composed and produced by The Vone.

name: THE MOLICE New Album "GATE"
blurb: Our new album "GATE" will be released in 2018. Please help us releasing, promotion and touring. 新作アルバムリリースのためのプロジェクトです。

name: District 97's 4th Studio Album
blurb: We've got a new lineup, new music, and it's time to share it with the world!

name: Louise Distras is Making A Record
blurb: I've been an independent artist for five years and I'm making my second record.

name: Flashback To Never
blurb: An alternate history podcast told through 1962 pop radio.

name: The Velveteen Band 2nd album: "What's on the Other Side"
blurb: Puppets! Rabbits!  Madness!  The Velveteen Band is releasing our second album, "What's on the Other Side" -- be a part of history!

name: Deltanaut - Part I - Debut Album Release
blurb: Part I, the debut album by Sheffield psych rockers Deltanaut is now complete. All it needs is a kick to get physical production sorted!

name: Blame It All On Sorcery by Old Man Wizard
blurb: "Blame It All On Sorcery" is the title of the second full length album by the Southern California rock band Old Man Wizard.

name: Black Tape For A Blue Girl's Ashes in the brittle air 30th
blurb: 2CD/LP 30th anniversary expanded edition. 1989 3rd album; ethereal, gothic, ambient with "Across a thousand blades." 21 bonus track CD.

name: Down For The Count 2020
blurb: 30th Anniversary Edition - digitally remixed and remastered

name: Pre-Sale Of New Lost Romance Album, "Strum It Again"
blurb: Our new full-length album, "Strum It Again" on our own label, Okazia Records.

name: Icon For Hire: Amorphous
blurb: New Music. New Rewards. New Era.

name: No Signal: The Debut EP
blurb: Help Wichita rock band No Signal create their debut 6-song EP.

name: This Blood Is Yours - Single
blurb: New single, new music video all in time for Halloween!

name: Sun House - Ticket To Fly
blurb: The debut album from the British Blues Rock band, Sun House.

name: Antigone Rising's Million Penny Marathon
blurb: The New Digital Release

name: Record 2021, by Alec Berlin
blurb: Help me finish making a record of 12 instrumental rock songs!

name: Run To Me EP - Jacob Isaac
blurb: A collection of songs inspired by the events of my life.

name: We Need Your Money for Sticky Toffee Pudding
blurb: Aphra headquarters has brand new music for your ears

name: K-Pop Band "2Z"'s 1st Regular Album "ACT1"
blurb: "2Z"'s Crowdfunding Campaign "Keeping Promise with You"

name: Secret Harbor Album "Where Wind & Water Meet" New Music
blurb: A Nautical Theme LP produced by Michelangelo Caggiano

name: YOUNG ATLAS - A Project by Cole Thannisch
blurb: A concept album recorded like a one-act rock opera all about learning lessons and journeying into a new world.

name: THE STEREO: THIRTEEN LP & PODCAST
blurb: Help support the vinyl production of a NEW ALBUM "THIRTEEN" LP & podcast series "KINGS OF NO HOPE" from THE STEREO.

name: "Reflections" Jackie Ernst Debut EP!
blurb: A collection of reflective, vulnerable and extremely personal original songs with full band arrangements

name: 12AX7's Debut Progressive Surf Rock Album: Rescue at Nazaré
blurb: 12AX7 is releasing their debut full-length album full of inventive instrumental guitar rock on vinyl and digital.

name: DISPEL : New album based on Dante's Inferno!
blurb: Help us release "INFERNO", a conceptual album based on Dante's masterpiece; a musical journey into each level of the 9 Hells!

name: District 97's 5th Studio Album
blurb: The world may have changed, but we're still here making the best music that we possibly can. Let's do it together!

name: BLOODGOOD singer, Les Carlsen's, Solo Project
blurb: Legendary lead singer of BLOODGOOD brings his dramatic style, unique voice, thoughtful lyrics and powerful music to this solo project.

name: The Blue Room - Album
blurb: We are a local naarm/melbourne band looking to release our debut album however we need your help to get over the finish line!

name: Knorrwood's Debut Album
blurb: Support the groundbreaking album featuring the tribal folk-rock sound of Knorrwood!

name: Don't Wake the Dreamer Part I Limited Cassette Release
blurb: An ambitious concept album combining lofi/dreamcore sounds with melodic singer/songwriter sensibilities.

name: Vinyl press of Mirrorball's new EP: Two Minutes More
blurb: We are ready to release our new Album: let's print the vinyls!

name: UNWELL - EP 2
blurb: Detroit-based Pop-Punk band UNWELL is making their second album.

name: New Blue Mother Tupelo Music On The Way!
blurb: Feel Good with Our New Soulful Country Rock & Blues Inspired Album Recorded in Nashville, TN & Como, MS! It's Electric!
